original_title: おとり捜査官・北見志穂Ⅱ
overview: After a series of arson attacks targeting red cars happens in the vicinity of Shiba Park, Shiho Kitami and Detective Hakamada of the MPD's First Investigation Division are asked by the local precinct to help with a stakeout. However, when the entire neighborhood loses power, a murder occurs...
title: おとり捜査官・北見志穂Ⅱ
